title: Champ Select issues
body:
Cannot ban. Cannot lock champion. Not working...

...AND I'm given TIME PENALTIES FOR THIS??

Pls fix asap

replies.body:
If you're still having problems with that and about to get (or already got) penalties for leaving so many lobbies, you may want to take a step back and do some troubleshooting in a custom or practice game before getting longer punishments. 

Whenever you can't ban, it's due to your network not sending that ban to the servers so the servers think you AFK'd. You need to make sure you've got a strong stable connection with our servers by checking through the basic troubleshooting steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), or alternatively using an ethernet cable instead.
Please don't assume that I'm not hard-wired or don't know about networking. My ping is 8ms and I'm running 175MBps down and 18 up. My connection is supremely stable and I never ever disconnect.
